titles.title: Abide, O Dearest Jesus
Abide with Us, Lord Jesus, Abide Among Us with Thy Grace, Abide with Us, Our Savior, Come, Abide with Thy Grace, in Our Hearts, O Savior, Go Beside us

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Abide, O dearest Jesus, Among us with Thy grace, That Satan may not harm us, Nor we to sin give place.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Abide, O dear Redeemer, Among us with Thy Word, And thus now and hereafter True peace and joy afford.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Abide with heav'nly brightness Among us, precious Light; Thy truth direct, and keep us From error's gloomy night.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Abide with richest blessings Among us, bounteous Lord; Let us in grace and wisdom Grow daily through Thy Word.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Abide with Thy protection Among us, Lord, our Strength, Lest world and Satan fell us And overcome at length.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Abide, O faithful Savior, Among us with Thy love;
Grant steadfastness, and help us To reach our home above.
